title: Crafting Item Catalog
description: Used to define the creative inventory/recipe book

A.title: Format Version
A.description: A version that tells minecraft what type of data format can be expected when reading this file.

B_category.title: Category
B_category.description: You can add new items to the existing categories.

category_name.title: Category Name
category_name.description: Determines which category this block/item will be placed under in the inventory and crafting table container screens.

groups.title: Groups
groups.description: Defines a new group which will be added to the category you specify at the end of all existing items/groups.

B_group.title: Group
B_group.description: Represents a group of items. A group can be collapsible if it is provided with a group identifier, or added a set of loose items without an icon.

group_identifier.title: Group Identifier
group_identifier.description: Optional field to give an icon and name to a group. Otherwise the items are added as loose items. If there are two groups with the same name within a category, they will merge.

icon.title: Icon
icon.description: The item or block that represents the group.

name.title: Name
name.description: The localization string that is display when you hover over your group name. The localization string needs to include the namespace.

items.title: Items
items.description: List of items to be added

anyOf.description: The name of an item or block. A namespace for the item is required
The name of an item or block. A namespace for the item is required

name.description: You can optionally provide an aux value for items that use it at the end. Example: namespace:my_item:1
